content: i m new to making my own patterns so any testers and help with my pattern would be much appreciated please let me know what i can improve of enjoy ---------------------------------- this cute guy is the perfect addition to your family he s a charming lanky guy that is the best size for hugging he d make a wonderful gift for kids friends family or even a gift for yourself add him to your collection today the following digital download is a pdf crochet pattern to make one medium large fox it s an intermediate difficulty pattern you will need knowledge of magic_ring color changes basic stitches increases decreases and it includes a moderate amount of sewing pdf pattern includes 11 pages of detailed pattern visual sewing guide pictures of final product description of items needed and associated terms materials needed - 6 50 mm k/10½ crochet hook - tapestry needle and scissors - polyester fiberfill stuffing - 1 skein lion brand wool ease thick and quick yarn in color spice - <1 skein lion brand wool ease thick and quick yarn in color oatmeal - <1 skein lion brand wool ease thick and quick yarn in color black this pattern is for personal use only please do not resell or redistribute without express permission you can sell the items made as long as it s not in a commercial quantities and pattern credited to @aybeecreates i d love to see the projects you create please tag me @aybeecreates you can contact me at aybeecreates@gmail com with any questions or concerns thank you so much for your support happy crocheting <3
